items.description: Traverse the node tree. Select the node at the given index, or the previous node.
(if file name contains 'clip', will load as clipboard data, replacing any previously copied data)
The type must be one is of: f,field,n,node. ( I nclude or E xclude ending index)
The type must be one is of: f,field,n,node. ( I nclude or E xclude ending index)
Exit the script. Note: does not save before exiting.
